content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• XLM pumps 5% like a boss, then shits itself in the final hour.
• Volume’s through the roof, but that didn’t save its ass.
• Still holding above $0.10, so not all hope is lost yet.

Impact — XLM’s rollercoaster ride proves crypto’s as unpredictable as ever.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/markets/2025/09/05/xlm-surges-5-before-dramatic-final-hour-collapse
